attributes.action: To not include children in the 'rule of 6' for Covid restriction.
attributes.additional_details: For people with small children especially babies to be able to get childcare and socialise is very difficult with the rule of 6. It is also very confusing for children to not be included in Scotland's policy but are included in England.
attributes.background: To align with Scotland and not include children in the rule of 6 people meeting up in public and private spaces.
